page_title_en: Fortnite High Octane Event Challenges And Rocket League Rewards
page_description_en: Here's how to complete all 11 challenges in the latest Fortnite and Rocket League crossover event.
page_text_html:
When Epic bought Rocket League studio Psyonix, the fan dream of driving Rocket League cars inside Fortnite seemed closer to reality. Today, it is reality. After a brief stint as a Creative mode asset, Rocket League's de facto mascot battle-car, Octane, is now available in battle royale, as well as across several player-made Creative modes. Even better, there's a ton of XP and Rocket League-themed items to unlock for free. Here's the full run of challenges you can complete in-game, alongside the many cosmetics and other rewards you'll earn for your efforts.

Fortnite Rocket League challenges - High Octane event

There are 11 challenges in total, though you only need to complete eight of them to unlock all cosmetic rewards. Still, they all give XP, so it may be worth finishing off the list if you need to finish your Chapter 3, Season 4 battle pass before the Chapter 3 finale, Fracture.

Battle royale and Zero Build challenges

  • Fly 100 meters continuously in an Octane - 20,000 XP
  • Hit opponents while riding in an Octane (3) - 20,000 XP
  • Perform a 720 front or back flip in the air with an Octane - 20,000 XP

The final eight challenges must be completed in specific Creative maps. In-game, these are prominently featured in the game's Discover tab, but we've also included each map's creative code in case you want to find it that way.

RL Live challenges - creative code 9775-0165-8588

  • Earn points (100) - 20,000 XP
  • Earn points (250) - 20,000 XP

Sniper vs. Octanes - creative code 8992-9205-6512

  • Damage car opponents (600) - 20,000 XP
  • Eliminate snipers (1) - 20,000 XP

Octane Race - creative code 3847-7344-8745

  • Complete a lap in under two minutes and 30 seconds - 20,000 XP
  • Complete laps (2) - 20,000 XP

Rocketeer Ruins - creative code 5620-6416-3977

  • Collect coins (8) - 20,000 XP
  • Reach each Hardpoint (5) - 20,000 XP

Rewards and cosmetics

Four more challenges act as the milestone markers and reward dispensers for the event. Tallying a total of two, four, six, and ultimately eight completed challenges from the above list will net you the following rewards, including four new styles for the ever-changing Back Board back bling:

  • Complete two Octane quests - Back Board back bling (if not yet owned) and Aerial Assist style
  • Complete four Octane quests - 'Brella Beach style and Octane Smash spray
  • Complete six Octane quests - Battle-Car Blaze style and Shot In Flight emoticon
  • Complete eight Octane quests - Fifty-Fifty style and Clutch Victory pickaxe

Rocket League and Rocket League Sideswipe rewards

Even more rewards await you in Rocket League and its mobile spin-off, Rocket League Sideswipe. For completing eight Octane quests in Fortnite, you'll also unlock a bunch more in Psyonix's acclaimed games, including:

  • Whiplash car
  • Whiplash wheels
  • Flames decal
  • Stripes decal
  • Wings decal
  • Lightning decal

Now you just need to drop in and find yourself a battle-car, and luckily, we have a guide on where to find Octane in battle royale. For more on Epic's battle royale, check out everything we know about December's launch of Fortnite Chapter 4.
